captions.text:
00:07
COMM: In Botswana a hungry leopard makes a

stunning leap from a tree, to kill one of
the unsuspecting impala grazing below.

00:28
COMM: In Moremi National Park a safari guide

spots a female leopard hiding in a tree, and
photographer Yasmin Tajik from Las Vegas,
was able to document the events as they unfolded.

00:40
COMM: The leopard is waiting for a group of

nearby impala to come closer, and after biding
her time for around ten minutes, she seizes

00:53
COMM: The other impalas scatter, and the leopard
tries to drag her kill up a tree.

01:04
COMM: She fails and decides to eat it on the

01:11
COMM: After feeding for a whole she tries

to take the carcass up into a tree again,
but the branches aren't strong enough to hold

the combined weight of both animals, and they
fall to the ground.

01:23
COMM:Exhausted from all the effort the big

cat then hides her kill and takes a well earned
nap in the shade.

title: Leopard Attack: Leopard Jumps From Tall Tree To Ambush Impala
